Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 60th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1973...
Injured on 4/16/1977 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Traded from New Jersey to Plum Grove on 7/30/1979 (Going to NJ: 1B A. Maultsby. Going to PG: C W. Whitby, P J. Segura)...
Had first career hit on 8/26/1981, off James Pressnell (PIT)...
Injured on 6/28/1983 with a Broken Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 4/21/1984 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 8/10/1986, off Amanda Whurlitzer (MAN)...
